TopLeftFeatureDesc: Experience a streamlined narrative as you level to the new max of 50!
BottomLeftFeatureDesc: Visit a Barber Shop to explore all-new looks.
RightFeatureDesc: Explore your updated class abilities and prepare for the coming darkness.

TopLeftFeatureDesc: Pledge loyalty to one of four unique covenants and gain new powers.
BottomLeftFeatureDesc: Visit a Barber Shop to explore all-new looks.
RightFeatureDesc: Explore the realms of the afterlife and uncover the mysteries of death.

TopLeftFeatureDesc: Push back the Jailer's forces in the rediscovered City of Secrets.
BottomLeftFeatureDesc: Reach new heights with the revamped progression system.
RightFeatureDesc: Defend the eternal forest from the Banshee Queen's incursion!

TopLeftFeatureDesc: Thwart a high-stakes broker heist in the Veiled Market!
BottomLeftFeatureDesc: Updated dungeon and PvP rewards, and the new Mythic+ affix: Tormented.
RightFeatureDesc: At long last, battle Sylvanas Windrunner as you raid the Jailer's stronghold!
